item.title: Labor Inspector General Launches Probe Into BLS’s Data Collection Challenges
item.description: The probe will address issues faced by BLS in collecting information regarding PPI and CPI, as well as the monthly employment reports.

item.title: Why Did Synopsys Stock Tumble 34% Today?
item.description: The company’s Q3 revenue of $1.74 billion and adjusted earnings per share of $3.39 both came in below the analysts’ consensus estimate of $1.77 billio...

item.title: Oracle Stock Explodes 40% After CEO Says Company Expects Over Half A Trillion Dollars In Booked Cloud Orders
item.description: Oracle CEO Safra Catz said on Tuesday that the company had signed four multi-billion-dollar contracts in the first quarter.

item.title: Trump Media Seeks To Expand ‘Truth Social Funds’ With 5 New America-First ETF Filings
item.description: The company announced that the ETFs are expected to launch later this year on the NYSE Arca, although proposed fees weren’t disclosed.

item.title: Binance Crypto Exchange Teams Up With Franklin Templeton To Build Digital Asset Products
